question: A museum near your home is looking for people to do part-time voluntary/unpaid work. You would like to do some voluntary/unpaid work at the museum. Write a letter to the museum director to apply for the unpaid work. In your letter: • Explain why you want to do voluntary work at the museum. • Describe some skills and qualities you have that would be useful. • Give details of when you would be available for work.
text: I would like to express my interest to apply for the voluntary position that was advertised in the Times newspaper on the 28th January 2021.

I am interested to work in the museum because I think that I could enrich my knowledge about ancient objects on which I am planning to do a project for my final year.  In addition, I noticed that it is a part-time position and I still need some time to prepare for my studies.

Moreover, when I was in high school, I had an opportunity to work as a volunteer in a local museum where I assisted in arranging the objects on display and answering the phone calls. I believe I have relevant experience to work in this position.
I am available anytime at your convenience. Please reach me on my mobile or by email. I look forward to hearing from you.
